page.title: 05Employment in Barton
page.content: For those who work in Barton the three schools employ the largest number of people but not all of these are residents.Assistants are employed in the shops in Main Street,Oak Road Precinct,The Green and Mill Lane. Employees are required in the seven Public Houses,the Cottage Hospital,the Health Centre,the Bowls club,the Dentist,the Police Station,the Fire Station,some small light idustrial units in Efflinch Lane and the Clarke Group Offices at Barton Hall.The self employed include farmers,builders, painters and decorators.Most residents work outside the village at places like Drakelow Power Station,Douglas Concrete,Marley Tiles,Spun Concrete and the Breweries in Burton-On-Trent. Some peole commute each day to Derby, Stoke,Birmingham and Leicester.
